Title: Judicators with Boltstorm Crossbows
Legend: Judicators who wield boltstorm crossbows are adept in the culling of enemy hordes. These rapid-firing weapons launch ammunition tipped with blessed sigmarite; by the time these strike home, they are thoroughly enveloped in coruscating storm-energies.
Intro: Each model in a Judicators with Boltstorm Crossbows unit is armed with a Boltstorm Crossbow and Storm Gladius. 1 in every 5 models can replace their Boltstorm Crossbow with a Thunderbolt Crossbow.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderhead Brotherhood • Vanguard Wing

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Judicator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Boltstorm Crossbow or Thunderbolt Crossbow.

Rules.Name: Rapid Fire
Rules.Fluff: When steadied, a boltstorm crossbow can unleash a deadly hail of fire.
Rules.Rule: If an attack made with a Boltstorm Crossbow scores a hit, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
